Which video codec is used by the MythTV Tuner?. Most frequent values are: 'mpeg2video', 'h264' and 'hevc'. For DVB SD in Europe and US ATSD use 'mpeg2video'. For DVB HD in Europe use 'h264'. For UHD use 'hevc'.
Which audio codec is used by the MythTV Tuner?. Most frequent values are: 'mp2' and 'ac3'. For DVB with Stereo sound use 'mp2'. For DD5.1 sound use 'ac3'
What are the max channels the MythTV Tuner will provide?. Set to 2 for Stereo sound and 6 for DD5.1 sound)
Which container is used by the MythTV Tuner?. Most frequent values are: 'mpegts', 'mpegtsraw' and 'mp4'. For DVB tuners best is 'mpegtsraw'.
